bill_title: to require the repayment of certain financial assistance provided to John Morrell and Company.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require the repayment of certain financial assistance provided to John Morrell and Company. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. Any assistance to be provided to John Morrell and Company as a result of the enactment of chapter 11 of the 1994 South Dakota Session Laws is terminated. John Morrell and Company or its parent company shall repay to the State of South Dakota any financial assistance that the company has received or will receive through June 30, 1998, as a result of the enactment of chapter 11 of the 1994 South Dakota Session Laws. The repayment shall be at an annual interest rate of six percent and shall be made regardless of whether the financial assistance was in the form of a forgivable loan, regardless of whether the financial assistance was made through a third party, and regardless of whether the financial assistance was provided with or without interest. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
